rooms.name: King Studio with Sofa Bed
rooms.description:
King Studio with Sofa Bed
The most exclusive room we offer is distinct from its relaxing or reading area, where guests may enjoy privacy within their room.

rooms.name: Triple Room
rooms.description: The triple room has a queen and a single bed and has been adapted for accomodating families or groups of three.

rooms.name: Deluxe Double with Balcony
rooms.description: This premium deluxe room is larger in size, holds a double queen size bed, is fitted with parquet floors, and with a balcony outdoor area.

rooms.name: Double Room with Balcony
rooms.description: This is our double queen-sized bedroom with a balcony outdoor area. The balcony rooms are larger than the standard rooms.

rooms.name: Twin Room with Balcony Twin Room with Balcony
rooms.description: The balcony that overviews one of the most famous streets of Tirana gives character to this room while keeping complete quietness inside.

rooms.name: Double Room
rooms.description: Double Rooms have large and comfortable queen beds for those of you who'd like to share a bed in a more intimate setting.

rooms.name: Twin Room
rooms.description: The Twin Room is our most common room type, holding two comfortable twin single beds to accommodate two.

rooms.name: Single Economy Room
rooms.description: For a more economical alternative, the single traveler can comfortably be accommodated in the Single Economy Room.
